mapper.sql: select iu.inventory_unseeded_guid, iu.inventory_field_guid, iu.crop_commodity_id, cc.commodity_name as crop_commodity_name, cc.is_crop_insurance_eligible_ind, cc.is_inventory_crop_ind, iu.is_unseeded_insurable_ind, iu.acres_to_be_seeded, iu.create_user, iu.create_date, iu.update_user, iu.update_date
mapper.insert:
select replace(cast(gen_random_uuid() as text), '-', '')
insert into inventory_unseeded( inventory_unseeded_guid, inventory_field_guid, crop_commodity_id, is_unseeded_insurable_ind, acres_to_be_seeded, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date ) values ( #{inventoryUnseededGuid}, #{dto.inventoryFieldGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.cropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.isUnseededInsurableInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.acresToBeSeeded, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now(), #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now() )
mapper.update: update inventory_unseeded set crop_commodity_id = #{dto.cropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, is_unseeded_insurable_ind = #{dto.isUnseededInsurableInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, acres_to_be_seeded = #{dto.acresToBeSeeded, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where inventory_unseeded_guid = #{dto.inventoryUnseededGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}
mapper.delete: delete from inventory_unseeded where inventory_field_guid in (select t.inventory_field_guid from inventory_field t where t.field_id = #{fieldId})

delete from inventory_unseeded t where t.inventory_field_guid in (select invf.inventory_field_guid from inventory_contract inv join grower_contract_year gcy on gcy.contract_id = inv.contract_id and gcy.crop_year = inv.crop_year join contracted_field_detail cfd on cfd.grower_contract_year_id = gcy.grower_contract_year_id join annual_field_detail afd on afd.annual_field_detail_id = cfd.annual_field_detail_id join inventory_field invf on invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = afd.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id where inv.inventory_contract_guid = #{inventoryContractGuid} )
mapper.select: from inventory_unseeded iu left join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = iu.crop_commodity_id where iu.inventory_field_guid = #{inventoryFieldGuid} order by iu.inventory_unseeded_guid
